content.prompt: A decrease in the supply of oranges raised the price of oranges in the market. The substitution effect of the price increase will motivate consumers to

choices.label: raise their real income to offset the price effect
demand that the government set a price ceiling for oranges
increase the quantity of other fruits demanded and decrease the quantity of oranges demanded
decrease the quantity of other fruits demanded and increase the quantity of oranges demanded

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
